organic.title: Deadline extended: an update on the Microsoft deal
organic.snippet: Deadline extended: an update on the Microsoft deal. The Activision Blizzard and Microsoft boards have mutually agreed not to terminate the deal until after October 18.

organic.snippet: Hey everyone!
